{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Axesstel |model=MV440 |revision= |upc=816959013332 |ean= |asin=B006PHDM1Q |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/19/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=3G gateway |fcc_id=PH7MV440,NKRDRMR81 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Micrel |cpu1_model=KSZ8695PI;MICREL, KSZ8695PI, 1106A3K, 6DS7874.00M02, 06LWD1; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand=Qualcomm |cpu2_model=MSM6800A;Qualcomm, MSM6800A, B4A165.0, U3106105, |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV320BB-70TIP |fla1_num= |fla2=128 |fla2_brand=Hynix |fla2_model=H8ACS0EH0ACR-56M |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=ISSI |ram1_model=IS42S32800D-7TLI |ram1_num= |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=Hynix |ram2_model=H8ACS0EH0ACR-56M |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb DRMR-81 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2561 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2527 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=USB 2.0 Controller;NEC;Î¼PD720102;NEC, JAPAN, D720102GC, 1044MB442;1; |flags= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=AxessMV400 |default_ssid_regex=^AxessMV400$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:0B:6B |oui_eth=00:19:ED }} '''3G & Wi-Fi Gateway (4 Port Switch, 4 Antennas), Long Range Router'''
"MV440 MV3.1", "06.26.2008.", "7020MV440311" is silkscreened :on the top and bottom of one particular MV440's board.
There is no FCC ID printed on the unit's label, but the internal wireless module is labeled.
The power adapter included with the unit may be an ''unbranded'' :S024JU1200200 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 600mA -> 12VDC, 2000mA).
